quote: For whatever reason, not all people are born with the particular gift of being able to express ourselves through music. And, believe me, it is a gift.
author: Billy Joel

quote: Live music is healthy.
author: John Lydon

quote: Live music is better.
author: Neil Young

quote: When you get the right people together, writing music becomes very effortless.
author: Peter Hook

quote: I had a couple of really cool friends when I was a kid, and we'd find cool music and movies and show them to each other. My friend Dennis had a copy of 'A Clockwork Orange' and he'd already seen it once, and he was like, 'We need to watch this.' I was sleeping over his house - and I think we were literally 15 - and we watched it.
author: Gerard Way

quote: My music had roots which I'd dug up from my own childhood, musical roots buried in the darkest soil.
author: Ray Charles

quote: To know how to suggest is the great art of teaching. To attain it we must be able to guess what will interest; we must learn to read the childish soul as we might a piece of music. Then, by simply changing the key, we keep up the attraction and vary the song.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Life is like music, it must be composed by ear, feeling and instinct, not by rule. Nevertheless one had better know the rules, for they sometimes guide in doubtful cases, though not often.
author: Paracelsus

quote: Anybody under the age of forty knows hip-hop, gospel and R&B pretty well, and it's all a part of what we consider to be 'black music.' There is a natural synergy between the three.
author: John Legend

quote: My loathings are simple: stupidity, oppression, crime, cruelty, soft music.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Good music is very close to primitive language.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Music is the most powerful form of communication in the world. It brings us all together. Even religion separates us, but a hit record unites us across religious beliefs, race, politics.
author: Sean Combs

quote: It's funny, when bands or younger musicians ask me: 'So, what does it take to make it?' Well, first explain to me what you mean by 'making it': Do you want to be a rock star or do you want music to be your livelihood?
author: Eddie Van Halen

quote: There's a tacit belief that actors shouldn't write books, they're sort of allowed to direct movies but there will be a lot of skepticism, and they shouldn't do artwork or music. There are these invisible roadblocks to gain entree to these areas for actors, and you kind of have to crash through those invisible barriers.
author: James Franco

quote: We don't make music - it makes us.
author: David Byrne

quote: My masters are strange folk with very little care for music in them.
author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quote: I can remember dancing around living room with my two sisters to the music of Paganini and Mozart. I can still remember my dad combing the newspaper, circling all the free concerts in town, and on the weekends, we would go as a family.
author: Lindsey Stirling

quote: Music is a lady that I still love because she gives me the air that I breathe. We need all sorts of nourishment. And music satisfies and nourishes the hunger within ourselves for connection and harmony.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: I'd much rather go out and have music randomly presented to me by different DJs than stay home and discover it on my own.
author: Moby

quote: The Internet was a saving grace for promoting and exposing, and even creating. It's a parallel world to the music industry that already exists, and I'm glad to be a part of it.
author: Chuck D

quote: My job in this life is to give people spiritual ecstasy through music. In my concerts people cry, laugh, dance. If they climaxed spiritually, I did my job. I did it decently and honestly.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: People come to music to seek oblivion: is that not also a form of deception?
author: Claude Debussy

quote: I just worked my own personal thoughts into my music, and just kept at it until I found a way in.
author: Taj Mahal

quote: If you're doing black music, you should have a core understanding of where that comes from, and the fundamentals - so you're not some bozo thinking you're doing something new.
author: Anderson Paak

quote: I think music should be scary. Music is an exorcism.
author: Florence Welch

quote: You don't need any brains to listen to music.
author: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: It is so important for people at a young age to be invited to embrace classical music and opera.
author: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: The music is the message, the message is the music. So that's my little ministry that the Big Man upstairs gave to me - a little ministry called love and happiness.
author: Al Green

quote: I figured as long as the music stayed hot and important and good, that there would always be a reason for 'Soul Train.'
author: Don Cornelius

quote: Music is a language and different people who come along are each using that language to do something different, but all coming at it in a similar vein inasmuch as it's always community based and for the most part nonprofit. Most bands don't ever come within a mile of profit - clearly these people are not playing music to make money.
author: Ian MacKaye

quote: My sound definitely pays a lot of homage to the Nineties, but not just the dance music. There's also breakbeats, R&B, the big ballads. It's that whole era infused with very modern sounds.
author: Kiesza

quote: Country music has always been about as close to R&B as you can possibly get. We're storytellers.
author: Lionel Richie

quote: I do what I love, thank God. I get to make music and get inspiration through Judaism. I can see why people might be surprised, because it's not been done before. It's certainly not typical. People are always trying to wrap head their around it. But it's probably simpler than everyone thinks.
author: Matisyahu

quote: Nothing is more singular about this generation than its addiction to music.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: I was on a path that could've really led to disaster, and the one thing for me that really kept me focused and gave me something to believe in and a sense of self-worth and a discipline was music.
author: Flea

quote: Nas always been my favorite rapper, but 50 Cent, he changed my way of thinking about music 'cause he was so detailed in his music, I knew that wasn't lying. I never felt Tupac that way; I never felt Biggie that way. I love Nas music, but I never felt and believed like, 'This is for real.' 'Cause I grew up that gangsta lifestyle.
author: Schoolboy Q

quote: A song is a lot of things. But, first of all, a song is the voice of its time. Setting words to music gives them weight, makes then somehow easier to say, and it helps them to be remembered.
author: Richard Rodgers

quote: I have a great liking for the Chamba folk music, which depicts the beauty of women and the mountains with a touch of Indian classical music.
author: Mohit Chauhan

quote: Not being able to read and write music is not the same as being illiterate in speech and writing.
author: Yanni

quote: Hip-hop and electronic music are so similar, in the fact that they're both very visceral, have so much bass; a lot of times, it's the same tempos. The culture and some of the sound design is different but a lot of times, it's the same stuff.
author: Skrillex

quote: Because of piracy there has been a massive downturn in people buying music, which makes it more difficult for artists to make money from the sale of records.
author: Lily Allen

quote: For me, rockabilly is very, very exciting music. It's electric and kind of wild, you know? It's 'make your hairs stand up on the back of your neck' kind of music.
author: Imelda May

quote: I think it's important to really press on with the song writing and just go with it. There's no code, there's no craft... it's just let yourself shine through your music. If it's meant to be loved and heard, it'll happen.
author: Chantal Kreviazuk

quote: After the music that had been created by my family, I thought there was no way I could stack up.
author: Thomas Newman

quote: But I really believe that you don't do music because you want to, you do it because you have to.
author: Dan Reynolds

quote: More people are asking me to come and sing for them, so obviously I am getting more work. But apart from singing, I have been parallely programming and producing music tracks and assisting music directors. That is my bread and butter, which is how I survived in Mumbai. Now I can't leave it.
author: Arijit Singh

quote: I think the thing that we agreed to so many years ago, actually, was that the music didn't have to support the dance nor the dance illustrate the music, but they could be two things going on at the same time.
author: Merce Cunningham

quote: Nearly all children have a feeling for rhythm in words, for the delicate pattern of nursery rhymes. Many adults have lost this feeling and, if they read verse at all, demand a far cruder music than that which they once appreciated.
author: Louis MacNeice

quote: For me, let's keep jazz as folk music. Let's not make jazz classical music. Let's keep it as street music, as people's everyday-life music. Let's see jazz musicians continue to use the materials, the tools, the spirit of the actual time that they're living in, as what they build their lives as musicians around.
author: Pat Metheny

quote: Music is gathering. Taking our scattered thoughts and senses and coalescing us back into our core. Music is powerful. The first few chords can change us where no self-help books can.
author: Jane Siberry

quote: In 1952, Muddy cut the song 'Rollin' Stone.' It was a nationwide success, and the song echoes down through rock n' roll history. Bob Dylan cut a tribute by the same name, an English band decided to call themselves the Rolling Stones, and the magazine that first embraced music as a serious cultural phenomenon was itself called 'Rolling Stone.'
author: Tim Cahill

quote: In 'thinking up' music I usually have some kind of a brass band with wings on it in back of my mind.
author: Charles Ives

quote: I've always wanted my lyrics to say something meaningful and, you know, you always want to tell a message with your art. So yes, as I continue to write music, I will write about things that are real and things that I feel aren't written about a lot.
author: Hayley Kiyoko

quote: Music is something I couldn't live without. My dad was into music, he played for pleasure - guitar, piano. I started off doing jazz, singing with a lot of fabulous musicians here in London before I went to the States. And I still take piano lessons every Wednesday.
author: Marianne Jean-Baptiste

quote: All your experiences, the places you go to, the encounters you have with people, and, of course, your cultural trappings all make you who you are, and who you are makes your music.
author: Cyrille Aimee

quote: I started EWF because I had a vision, and music was playing in my head that I wanted to bring through. What I had in mind was exactly what Earth, Wind & Fire became.
author: Maurice White

quote: Classical music can rock you!
author: Ji-Hae Park

quote: Like all tools, modern technology has produced some wonderful moments in music and also some horrors.
author: Hugh Hopper

quote: Music is an outburst of the soul.
author: Frederick Delius

quote: Hell is full of musical amateurs.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I'm pretty sure in my older years, I'll be doing old-time flavored folk-mountain music.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: I'm definitely influenced by the music. We dance to music, and you have to listen to it and phrase your dancing and movement in a certain way to compliment the music. We have to work hand in hand, the dancer and the music.
author: Misty Copeland

quote: What I've discovered is that in art, as in music, there's a lot of truth-and then there's a lie. The artist is essentially creating his work to make this lie a truth, but he slides it in amongst all the others. The tiny little lie is the moment I live for, my moment. It's the moment that the audience falls in love.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I feel like everything I do in the hip-hop world has an influence. People don't really notice what I did until somebody else does it. As far as hip-hop goes, I want to continue to make good music, and good art. I don't really follow the state of hip-hop.
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: Anytime you look at anything that's considered artistic, there's a commercial world around it: the ballet, opera, any kind of music. It can't exist without it.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Nashville is wicked. It's like a proper music community, but it's also quintessentially American. You bump into people there with cowboy hats that spit in jars and call you 'boy.' I just love that.
author: Ed Sheeran

quote: None of my kids want to be actors. They are actually very interested in being musicians. I think they like the process of film from the outside. Mad is interested in editing. Pax loves music and deejaying.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: People make music to get a reaction. Music is communication.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: I was ready to quit music. It felt to me like music equalled death.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: When I listen to music these days, and I hear Pro Tools and drums that sound like a machine - it kinda sucks the life out of music.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: The reason I play music is to touch people - for selfish reasons, as well. It feels good to make someone else feel something, whether it's a kiss, a painting, good idea or it's a song.
author: Dave Matthews

quote: I think this whole division between the genres has more to do with marketing than anything else. It's terrible for the culture of music.
author: Tom Waits

quote: What I like about pop music, and why I'm still attracted to it, is that in the end it becomes our folk music.
author: Bono

quote: A lot of music doesn't do one thing or another. It just doesn't do anything. Then there are those pieces of music that thrill your soul. It's such a wide range, and it's really interesting that we all love different things.
author: David Lynch

quote: The iPod completely changed the way people approach music.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I was very camera shy. People like hot girls, so I put my music to hot girls and it just became a trend. The whole 'enigmatic artist' thing, I just ran with it. No one could find pictures of me.
author: The Weeknd

quote: There is this tremendous amount of arrogance and hubris, where somebody can look at something for five minutes and dismiss it. Whether you talk about gaming or 20th century classical music, you can't do it in five minutes. You can't listen to 'The Rite of Spring' once and understand what Stravinsky was all about.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I just kind of went into the blue-collar workforce at a really young age and discovered music, in terms of being a musician, around the same time. The good news is, I was probably 17 when I knew that's what I was going to do with the rest of my life, no matter what that meant.
author: Chris Cornell

quote: You get a lot of who you are as a musician across through the music you write. If you're writing your own music, then it's important to be really honest.
author: Harry Styles

quote: Music is a great energizer. It's a language everybody knows.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: At one point, I was hell-bent on being a Disney animator, and sort of got over that in college and wanted to do my own stuff. You know, towards the end of college I had actually planned to go to the Boston Conservatory of Music for musical theater.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: I think people need to have fun with whatever they're doing - makeup, their clothes, music, live shows - anything you don't need to take too seriously, don't take too seriously.
author: Kesha

quote: Film music should have the same relationship to the film drama that somebody's piano playing in my living room has on the book I am reading.
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: I think that's what it is with rock music. It helps you hang tough, I guess.
author: Angus Young

quote: Long intros are cool because there's a little bit of anticipation, you know?
author: Miranda Lambert

quote: A great song is a great song, whether it's on vinyl or CD or cassette or reel to reel or mp3. Then again, that might be an overly optimistic view, but I do think that great music will transcend the medium in which it is delivered.
author: Moby

quote: If I was in a zombie apocalypse, I wouldn't be playing music, because that would attract zombies.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: I ended up turning down a full scholarship of music at the conservatory to pay to go to cooking school.
author: Emeril Lagasse

quote: I became a human jukebox, learning all these songs I'd always known, discovering the basics of what I do. The cathartic part was in the essential act of singing. When is it that the voice becomes an elixir? It's during flirting, courtship, sex. Music's all that.
author: Jeff Buckley

quote: YouTube provides a unique opportunity for all musicians to market and promote their music and directly engage their fans.
author: Chad Hurley

quote: I was a little chubby kid that no girls ever talked to. I had little chance of becoming an internationally known rock star. Music was my escape and my belief system.
author: Andy Biersack

quote: I think it's important for people who love music to retain physical CDs or even vinyl, because it sounds so great and so much warmer than music over the internet.
author: Norah Jones

quote: If your music is great, you will have fans, not because you have spent time chatting on social media.
author: Bryan Adams

quote: Some nightlife places, people aren't there for the music, and it's depressing. I'm not just a club DJ; I am a producer, and I'll only DJ when the crowd is there to enjoy the music.
author: Ansel Elgort

quote: The romantic embrace can only be compared with music and with prayer.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Yeah, because what it all boils down to is at the end of the day, we are all riding on the same boat and we have to learn how to deal with each other. I think that the music and what we do in our actions is what can kind of bring us together, hopefully.
author: Bootsy Collins

quote: I think often sadness is a great place to get songs from.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: But when you get music and words together, that can be a very powerful thing.
author: Bryan Ferry

quote: When I did 'Unforgettable,' it wasn't appropriate for us to take liberties with that music. There had to be kind of a fine line between what had made it so great and the fact that a woman was singing it. We changed some of the arrangements, but not too much.
author: Natalie Cole

quote: I have to say that Adam Levine is truly a daring young man to go on Twitter to bash Fox News. He's so rebellious, so subversive. I mean, for a musician, seriously, could you find a more predictable stance than that? He's as edgy as a hacky sack, which also describes his music.
author: Greg Gutfeld

quote: I think downloading is both saving and killing the music industry at the same time.
author: Isaac Hanson

quote: I'm a real magpie when it comes to music; it's all random, and there's no pattern to what I like.
author: Rhys Ifans

quote: As an architect, you have to provide a shelter to enjoy art. And you have to love art. It's like when you make a concert hall. You must love music. This is the reason why you make the space, to enjoy music - making a space for art is the same thing.
author: Renzo Piano

quote: Whatever I've got going on, I play music to accompany me.
author: Brooke Burke

quote: As a kid, my parents had the typical stuff going on in the home, like Bee Gees, The Carpenters. Then I got exposed to what my brothers were listening to: a lot of classic rock, Led Zeppelin. It was around the mid-'80s when the whole Electro-Techno-Pop-House music thing started happening in Chicago.
author: Kaskade

quote: Music is universal too. Even deaf people like to dance, love rhythm, and can kind of pick it up.
author: Rainn Wilson

quote: I just love a slow groove. I feel so comfortable in it. But I listen to a lot of fast music, a lot of techno and house.
author: Chet Faker

quote: You have to pay attention, like with tours and expenses; you have to factor that all in. You want to play music for the rest of your life, you have to pay attention to all the things. You want to know what's always going on.
author: Zakk Wylde

quote: In times of war, starvation, hunger and injustice, such tragedy can only be put aside if you allow yourself to be uplifted through music, film and dance.
author: Emmanuel Jal

quote: As humans, we have the tendency to call on God only when we think that we're in dire straits as opposed to cultivating a real relationship with Him every day. And that's what my music tries to convey to all the listeners - try to cultivate it every day.
author: Yolanda Adams

quote: All art constantly aspires towards the condition of music.
author: Walter Pater

quote: I believe that my music is just about feelings, and the style is just a side effect.
author: Robert Palmer

quote: It's kind of odd when you think of Loretta Lynn, when she was first traveling and recording country music. It was all built through word of mouth. If you pleased the fans, they would pass it around to their friends and family.
author: Patty Loveless

quote: At a party in L.A., I met this middle-aged gentleman who I was talking to for ages when I asked, 'So, what do you do?' Turns out I was speaking to legendary music producer Quincy Jones, who worked on Michael Jackson's hits. And there was little old me rattling on - I was so embarrassed.
author: Elliot Cowan

quote: I've never missed a gig yet. Music makes people happy, and that's why I go on doing it - I like to see everybody smile.
author: Buddy Guy

quote: Filmmaking is a very complex form - ya know, acting, lighting, screenwriting, storytelling, music, editing - all these things have to come together.
author: Jay Duplass

quote: Blues is my life. It's a true feeling that comes from the heart, not something that just comes out of my mouth. Blues is what I love, and blues is what I always do.
author: Koko Taylor

quote: In music the passions enjoy themselves.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I don't want anyone to fail, so if you can make money off music even though you can't sing or dance, that's genius.
author: Prince

quote: The music, for me, doesn't come on a schedule. I don't know when it's going to come, and when it does, I want it out.
author: Prince

quote: I need music. It's like my heartbeat, so to speak. It keeps me going no matter what's going on - bad games, press, whatever!
author: LeBron James

quote: My first album was mainly dealing with street issues, and it was 'coded': it was called 'Reasonable Doubt.' So the things I was talking about... I was talking about in slang, and it was something that people in the music business was not really privy to. They didn't understand totally what I was saying or what I was talking about.
author: Jay-Z

quote: Death is the king of this world: 'Tis his park where he breeds life to feed him. Cries of pain are music for his banquet.
author: George Eliot

quote: Who hears music feels his solitude peopled at once.
author: Robert Browning

quote: I've said that playing the blues is like having to be black twice. Stevie Ray Vaughan missed on both counts, but I never noticed.
author: B. B. King

quote: It was my 16th birthday - my mom and dad gave me my Goya classical guitar that day. I sat down, wrote this song, and I just knew that that was the only thing I could ever really do - write songs and sing them to people.
author: Stevie Nicks

quote: I just hope that our fans are people who are inspired by music, and just use our music as a background or inspiration for whatever it is they do.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: I hate the technological rip-offs that pass for music formats these days, and go back to vinyl to hear a good record because the sound is always so much fuller. I don't even like listening to music in the car.
author: John Lydon

quote: Art works because it appeals to certain faculties of the mind. Music depends on details of the auditory system, painting and sculpture on the visual system. Poetry and literature depend on language.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: The people who know nothing about music are the ones always talking about it.
author: Nat King Cole

quote: You can't stay the same. If you're a musician and a singer, you have to change, that's the way it works.
author: Van Morrison

quote: It's like a dream to come to Spain and stay for a couple of years and get somebody to teach me Spanish music.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: The real art of conducting consists in transitions.
author: Gustav Mahler

quote: Music is intangible and ephemeral, but it comes from the home world of the spirit, and though so fleeting, it is recognized by the spirit as a soul-speech fresh from the celestial realms, an echo from the home whence we are now exiled, and therefore it touches a cord in our being, regardless of whether we realize the true cause or not.
author: Max Heindel

quote: The '70s and '80s were just the period during which the best soul music was created and the best records were done.
author: Don Cornelius

quote: The music industry is an interesting lens through which to look at change, because it has had such a difficult time adjusting to the digital age.
author: Jennifer Egan

quote: I don't need a sensationalized headline to sell music or to bring attention to my music. It's the music and it's always been about the music.
author: Big Boi

quote: My African heritage is a part of reggae music roots, and the concept is that the album, 'Revelation Part 1: The Root of Life' is a tribute to roots reggae music. The fruit is what blossoms into different colors and shades, but the root has to stand predominant.
author: Stephen Marley

quote: I guess a good song is a good song is a good song, ya know.
author: George Thorogood

quote: I like to add props to render the specificities of place - paintings, food, clothing, signs, infrastructure, music, sayings and slang particular to the region and particular to the character. And props shouldn't just sit there; they should get used.
author: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quote: What I've learned is that music affects the way you feel. A song can change someone's life.
author: David Archuleta

quote: When I grew up, the thing boys would do during the summer is work tobacco because it was a cheap product back then. I didn't want to do that. From an early, early, early age, I was like, 'I like music. This performing thing comes easy.' And perhaps that's how I ended up doing what I'm doing today. Being a musician.
author: Maceo Parker

quote: Music when healthy, is the teacher of perfect order, and when depraved, the teacher of perfect disorder.
author: John Ruskin

quote: When you are a real artist who is serious about your craft, you love good music. Period.
author: Lil' Kim

quote: Music is the best means we have of digesting time.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Music is nothing else but wild sounds civilized into time and tune.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Classical music is the kind we keep thinking will turn into a tune.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: In its beginnings, music was merely chamber music, meant to be listened to in a small space by a small audience.
author: Gustav Mahler

quote: Music is the fourth great material want, first food, then clothes, then shelter, then music.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: We all love musical architecture; there's no doubt about that.
author: Levon Helm

quote: You can never get silence anywhere nowadays, have you noticed?
author: Bryan Ferry

quote: Secretly, I wanted to look like Jimi Hendrix, but I could never quite pull it off.
author: Bryan Ferry

quote: Every song is like a painting.
author: Dick Dale

quote: Music is intended and designed for sentient beings that have hopes and purposes and emotions.
author: Jacques Barzun

quote: He has Van Gogh's ear for music.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: I asked my daughter when she was 16, What's the buzz on the street with the kids? She's going, to be honest, Dad, most of my friends aren't into Kiss. But they've all been told that it's the greatest show on Earth.
author: Ace Frehley

quote: I wake up in the morning, I do a little stretching exercises, pick up the horn and play.
author: Herb Alpert

quote: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: There's nothing like music to relieve the soul and uplift it.
author: Mickey Hart

quote: Sometimes before we make a record I go back and listen to a few. It's equally humbling and uplifting.
author: Michael Stipe

quote: I look at you and I write down what I hear.
author: Virgil Thomson

quote: My father used to sing to me in my mother's womb. I think I can name about any tune in two beats.
author: Yancy Butler

quote: It is essential to do everything possible to attract young people to opera so they can see that it is not some antiquated art form but a repository of the most glorious music and drama that man has created.
author: Bruce Beresford

quote: I was growing up listening to Queen. Freddie Mercury threw those incredible melodies into his songs.
author: Gary Cherone

quote: Music is very spiritual, it has the power to bring people together.
author: Edgar Winter

quote: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture.
author: Martin Mull

quote: That was when I realised that music is the most profound, magical form of communication there is.
author: Lesley Garrett

quote: There's nothing like a good cheating song to make me want to run home to be with my wife.
author: Steven Curtis Chapman

quote: Music is a performance and needs the audience.
author: Michael Tippett

quote: Music is always changing and the changes are unpredictable.
author: Billy Sheehan

quote: Any good music must be an innovation.
author: Les Baxter

quote: It's amazing to hear, as a voice matures and then starts to decline, what kind of emotion is still conveyed by a really good vocalist.
author: Tom Wopat

quote: There's a lot of music that sounds like it's literally computer-generated, totally divorced from a guy sitting down at an instrument.
author: Aimee Mann

quote: Sometimes I'll have sections that I'm not quite sure how they fit in the puzzle of a tune, they'll get moved around; what I think was originally a verse ends up becoming the chorus, or what's an intro gets dropped as a hook, things get shifted around a lot.
author: Gotye

quote: Although I am basically self taught, I consider Debussy my teacher - the most important elements are colour, light and shadow.
author: Toru Takemitsu

quote: Music's not like becoming a doctor, who can walk into a community and find people who need him.
author: Charlie Byrd

quote: My music, my songs are 100 percent inspired by girl power.
author: Paulina Rubio
